Name: steal
About the game: This is a simulation thief adventure game. The object of this game is to collect as many items as possible in the shortest time possible without being caught by the police.Control the thief to escape the police's flashlight, and quickly collect items to pass the level. Come and challenge for the highest score!If you're lucky, you'll be done in a few hours.
